name: tiramisu
description: Programmatic video creation engine using Canvas API and FFmpeg

scripts.build:wasm: cd src/rust_audio && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cd ../.. && wasm-bindgen src/rust_audio/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/tiramisu_audio_analyzer.wasm --out-dir ./dist/src/wasm --target nodejs
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:wasm && bun run build:ts
